news.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent warns of massive refunds if the Supreme Court voids Trump tariffs
news.summary: Bessent warns that a delayed ruling could result in a scenario in which $750 billion-$1 trillion in tariffs have already been collected.

news.title: Private equity giants raid Wall Street as fundraising talent wars heat up
news.summary: Private equity firms are ramping up hiring despite a deal drought. They remain optimistic about a rebound in activity. Private equity firms say they are optimistic that the deal drought will end.

news.title: Dan Ives to become chair of company that will buy Sam Altman-backed Worldcoin for its treasury
news.summary: Ives will help lead Eightco Holdings' treasury strategy around Worldcoin. Worldcoin will change the game for identity verification, Ives says.

news.title: Serena Williams invests in women's basketball league Unrivaled, now valued at $340 million
news.summary: Unrivaled is now valued at $340 million as the league gains Serena Williams as its newest investor. Unrivaled was founded in 2007 and is based in New York City.

news.title: The U.S. is losing travelers. Here are the countries that stand to benefit
news.summary: The U.S. stands to lose $30 billion in international tourism dollars this year. The money is set to flow to neighboring nations and beyond.

news.title: SpaceX deal sends EchoStar’s stock soaring. Why Musk is buying $17 billion in wireless spectrum.
news.summary: EchoStar soars further into record territory after a $17 billion deal to sell spectrum to Elon Musk’s SpaceX. The deal is expected to be worth more than $20 billion.

news.title: I’m a teacher, and fees are eating up my retirement savings so much that I don’t want to contribute anymore
news.summary: What are the options for getting out of paying 1% a year in a 403(b)? What are the Options for Getting Out of Paying 1% A Year in a 401(b)

news.title: What investors should expect from stocks after the Fed’s September meeting
news.summary: The stock market doesn’t always rally after interest-rate cuts. The U.S. stock market was down 0.7% on Thursday.

news.title: Weight loss has become the hottest new Chinese consumer craze
news.summary: A wellness boom is reshaping China, from gyms and diet apps to new injectable drugs. The boom is also changing the country's spending habits.

news.title: Oracle earnings are coming soon. Here’s what matters most to Wall Street.
news.summary: Oracle is expected to follow up last year’s strong cloud performance with even bigger growth this year. Analysts want to assess the impact on profit metrics.
